article_title: Health Group Of The Year: Akin Gump
article_text:
Health Group Of The Year: Akin Gump

Law360, Washington (January 28, 2015, 10:12 PM ET) -- From beating back a Medicare rule change that would have cost hospitals millions to helping a nursing facility shake off a whistleblower's False Claims Act suit with novel legal strategies, Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP’s health group delivered hospitals, health care systems and policy advocates another year of stellar legal results in 2014, earning the firm a spot among Law360’s Health Groups of the Year for the fourth consecutive year.



The firm’s Medicare litigation group — which practice head Jorge Lopez Jr. calls “unquestionably...
